title: Sophisticated Taiwan Retreat Near Historic Anping District
description: Discover the soul of Taiwan with a stay at Crowne Plaza Tainan, an IHG Hotel, placed just minutes from Taijiang National Park's lush mangroves and Anping District’s famed sword lions, street food and storied landmarks. After days spent exploring Taiwan’s cultural capital, head to Ren Kawara for sake sips and upscale teppanyaki, Cai Feng Lou for authentic Cantonese cuisine or enjoy time basking in the hotel's lobby, enjoying its stunning traditional-inspired architecture.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Tainan, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 289, Zhouping Road, Anping District, Tainan City, Taiwan 70841
